description: The iD38 is an app enhanced dual alarm clock for iPad, iPhone and iPod that lets you charge your iPad, Phone or iPod and lets you wake and sleep to any of these or to a custom playlist. A Time Sync button syncs the clock to your iPhone (which is always current via cell phone towers) to set the time quickly. The iD38 allows you to set two separate alarms with different times on different days with our 7-5-2 feature. FM radio with 6 station memory presets. The iD38 includes EQ controls and a line-in jack to listen to other devices.
title: iHome iD38SVC Stereo System with Dual Alarm FM Clock Radio for iPad/iPhone/iPod
